programme.title: FAC: Wimbledon v United 93/94
programme.desc: United Archives 20/2/94. United make light work of Wimbledon in this fifth round FA Cup tie.

programme.title: FAC: v Oldham 93/94 SF Replay

programme.title: FAC: United v Arsenal 07/08
programme.desc: United Archives 16/2/08. Sir Alex's 100th FA Cup game in charge of United saw them take on Arsenal, one of the oldest and fiercest foes.

programme.title: PL: United v Tottenham 08/09
programme.desc: United Archives 25/4/09. United took on Tottenham knowing that victory was a must, with Liverpool desperate for the Reds to slip up.

programme.desc: Third episode of the 'One Love' series depicts the heartfelt stories of three committed supporters with disabilities, as they simultaneously attend a match at Old Trafford.

programme.desc: Presenting the fourth film in our One Love series, telling the stories of three memorabilia-obsessed Reds.

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Erase Your Head: Gwen orders a personality modifying ray to tone her perky parents, but decides to test it on the class first. (S3 Ep21)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Teacher, Soldier, Chef, Spy: When Beth, Duncan and Izzy break Chef's new VR helmet they have to recreate his game world to keep him from ever finding out the truth. (S3 Ep22)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Thingameroo: When a lack of motivation threatens to sink the kids' chances in the Sportslete Athlaction Awards, they create the greatest mascot of all time to boost school spirit. (S3 Ep23)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: CodE.T.: When Cody gets sick, the kids want to send a message back to his home planet in the hope that they can save him, but Courtney is not in favour of the plan. (S3 Ep24)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Quiche it Goodbye: When an 'evil conglomerate' is threatening to take over Chef's favourite childhood restaurant, Owen rallies the kids to take them down. (S3 Ep25)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Ice Guys Finish Last: Chef brings a souvenir iceberg home from a trip to the South Pole and Duncan finds a prehistoric surprise inside. (S3 Ep26)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gwen Scary, Gwen Lost - Part 1: When Chef discovers his spooky Halloween pranks have never scared the kids, he's devastated, and agrees to hand over full control of his pranking to Gwen. (S3 Ep27)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gwen Scary, Gwen Lost - Part 2: Gwen's plan turns out far spookier than Chef ever hoped. (S3 Ep28)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Piranicus Race: Enki struggles to be more 'normal'...to the point of forgetting the Thousand Waterfalls race! But the Tikis need his ideas to escape the vicious Piranicus fish... (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of...
programme.desc: ...Ladybug & Cat Noir: Lady Wifi: Alya is convinced that Chloe is actually Ladybug, causing all sorts of mischief. Plus, with Hawk Moth around things get very hectic. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of...
programme.desc: ...Ladybug & Cat Noir: Princess Fragrance: Rose, a student who goes to high school with Marinette, gets akumatized by Hawk Moth and starts bewitching everyone with her perfumes. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Mess: Bad luck! L.J. breaks a Shard-embedded mirror so Jade becomes a trouble magnet while tracking the Shard. Worse, the evil Crimson Lord is back in town. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: Entrenched: To get information on Pearl Girl, Astra strikes a risky deal with a powerful fish, but the outcome is more than she bargained for. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: TP2: Judgement Bidet: When the city experiences a toilet paper shortage, Beth and Harold investigate and discover it's their old rival Sewer Mike who is the mastermind behind it all. (S3 Ep15)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dial B for Birder: Harold uncovers a secret plot that Chef's new parrot is hatching and tries to save his teacher, only to discover that Sugar figured it out before him. Or did she? (S3 Ep16)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Hole Lot of Trouble: When rain derails an outside game of catch, someone suggests they play inside. This prompts Izzy to lead the group through her wildly imaginative worst case scenario. (S3 Ep17)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Tall Tale: After Owen's BBF, Noah, goes through a growth spurt, Owen fears losing his friend and takes drastic action. (S3 Ep18)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Chews Wisely: When the floor ends up covered in gum on the day of a big bubble blowing contest, Sugar decides she might help herself win by helping her friends get stuck to the floor. (S3 Ep19)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Dingo Ate My Duncan: When all their classmates are replaced with well behaved Australian doppelgangers in a school exchange program, Lightning and Cody start getting suspicious. (S3 Ep20)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Païpaï Race: The Tikis face the Cold Kings in the Marshes, a place crawling with Lion Lilies. Seeking for a solution, Enki ventures alone into the jungle. Corto then rushes to his rescue. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Wishmaker: As Marinette thinks about her future, a supervillain shows up in Paris. Able to make people live their childhood dreams, he turns into a nightmare for our heroes. (S4 Ep18)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Simplificator: A relative of Marinette's is akumatized into Simplificator, a supervillain determined to simplify this overly complex world. (S4 Ep19)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Talk: The Crimson Lord uses a Shard-embedded megaphone to steal voices, including L.J.'s. Mute before she's in the suit, Jade plays videos of herself training. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Eye of the Tiger: Newsflash: Jade Armor stole the Golden Dragon! L.J. is appalled. Who is the imposter making her look bad? (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of...
programme.desc: ...Ladybug & Cat Noir: The Dark Owl: Ladybug faces Principal Damocles, now the Dark Owl. (S2 Ep12)

programme.desc: ...Ladybug & Cat Noir: Syren: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Syren in a flooded Paris. (S2 Ep13)

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Doomed Ballooned Marooned: After over-decorating a birthday table with balloons, several kids float away to a deserted island. (S3 Ep50)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Breaking Bite: Beth becomes the big dog on campus after she bites Duncan, but being the big dog is a dangerous thing, especially when you didn't actually bite anybody! (S3 Ep9)

programme.desc: Squirrels Squirrels Squirrels: Courtney's attempt to make Chef a better teacher fails when a squirrel gets his hands on her mind-control device. (S3 Ep11)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: WaterHose-Five: It's the hottest day of the year and a broken air conditioner leads to a water battle of epic proportions to determine who controls the garden hose. (S3 Ep13)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cody the Barbarian: Cody is set to inherit a video game empire from his long lost uncle, but only if he and his friends have what it takes to conquer a fantastical live action video game. (S3 Ep14)

programme.desc: TP2: Judgement Bidet: When the city experiences a toilet paper shortage, Beth and Harold investigate and discover it's their old rival Sewer Mike who is the mastermind behind it all. (S3 Ep15)

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Du a Gwyn yn paentio dinas gyda help eu ffrind newydd, Llwyd. Black and White colour a city with the help of new friend, Grey.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd â sawl cath fach a Delor a'i asynnod. Today we meet some cute kittens and Delor and her donkeys.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos the train and friends.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Daw galwad gan Gareth Potter y DJ a Lloyd - o na! mae eu seinyddion wedi torri. A call comes in from DJ Gareth Potter and Lloyd. Harri's help is needed as Gareth's speakers are broken.

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn deffro ar fore niwlog a'n meddwl bod Ynys Ddoeth wedi codi i'r cymylau. The Woohoos wake up on a foggy morning and think Wise Island has floated up into the clouds.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw yn ymuno â Chlwb Achub Bywyd Llanilltud Fawr; cwrddwn â Hollie a Heidi a'u ffrindiau pigog; a bydd Meleri a Ieuan yn chwilio am pob math o adar yn Llanelli. Fresh air fun!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Siôn yn perswadio Mario i roi cynnig ar fersiwn iachus o un o'i hoff fwydydd. Siôn persuades Mario to try a healthy version of his favourite dish.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Nel a Guto eisiau gwybod o ble ddaw hadau blodau haul. Mae Hywel, y ffermwr hud, yn mynd â nhw i Fferm Fach am dro. Nel and Guto want to know where Sunflower seeds come from.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Mr a Mrs Twrch yn mynd ar eu gwyliau, ac mae Twm Twrch yn gwahodd Mishmosh draw i aros. Mr and Mrs Twrch are going on holiday for the weekend, and Twm Twrch invites Mishmosh to stay.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn ôl gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back, with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Yn y ffair mae Joni'n awyddus i chwarae'r gemau fel y myn, tra ceisia Jason ddysgu gwerth strategaeth iddo. Joni is keen to play the fair games as he wants, while Jason values strategy.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd, ac y tro hwn byddwn yn dod i nabod crwban y mor a gloyn y llaethlys. This time, we get to know the sea turtle and the milkweed butterfly.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd y cwn direidus heddiw? What's happening in the mischievous pups' lives today?

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Y Dderwen sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Y Dderwen join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Cyfle i edych 'nôl dros rai o gyfarchion pen-blwydd yr wythnos. A look back at some of this week's birthday greetings.

programme.title: Nôl i'r Gwersyll
programme.desc: Mae'r criw'n aros ym mloc Penhelyg am benwythnos 80au. Pa weithgaredd fydd wedi'i drefnu i'r gwersyllwyr? It's 80s weekend! Which house is most competitive and what 80s food will they eat?

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Adam yn rhannu tips am gadw'r ardd lysiau yn gynhyrchiol, ac mae Meinir efo Stifyn Parri yn ei ardd yn San Ffagan. Rhys Rowlands challenges our view of how to use rhubarb in the kitchen.

programme.title: Cynefin
programme.desc: Mae Heledd, Iestyn a Ffion yn dod i adnabod ardal Rhosllanerchrugog - cymuned gyda llawer o hanes, diwylliant a diwydiant ar ffin Cymru - Lloegr. We discover more about Rhosllanerchrugog.

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau: Ymweliad â menter i gefnogi'r digartref yng Nghaerdydd, stori llenor ac ymgyrchydd dros hawliau LHDTC+, a mwy. Rhodri Gomer presents series highlights in the final programme.

programme.title: New: Ralio: Cymal Cyffro Sardinia
programme.desc: Cymal cyffro chweched rownd Pencampwriaeth Rali'r Byd o ynys Sardinia. Live Power Stage action from Rally Italia Sardegna, the sixth round of the World Rally Championship from Sardinia.

programme.title: Y Fets
programme.desc: Mae Bingo'r ci wedi gweithio i'r fyddin yn rhai o wledydd mwyaf peryglus y byd, gan gynnwys Afghanistan - ond beth sydd ganddo yn ei stumog? A brave forces dog is treated for stomach pains.

programme.title: Y Sîn
programme.desc: Awn i un o syrcasau cyfoes mwyaf Ewrop gyda Trystan Chambers, a chawn gip ar waith yr argraffwr Elin Crowley. We're at the Celtic Deaf Festival and see glass-work at Swansea School of Art.

programme.title: Am Dro!
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, cawn deithiau i Nant Gwrtheyrn, Rhoscolyn, Blaengarw a Ceunant Clydach, gyda Zoe, Islwyn, Jordan a Helen. Four walks, four competitors but only one winner. It's time to go Am Dro!

programme.title: Yr Ynys: Cyprus
programme.desc: Beti George sydd yn mynd â ni ar daith i gwrdd â rhai o drigolion Cyprus - y Groegwyr yn y de a'r Twrciaid yn y gogledd. Beti George takes us to Cyprus to meet Greeks and Turks living there.

programme.title: Darn Bach o Hanes
programme.desc: Dewi Prysor sy'n edrych ar sut mae pobl wedi manteisio ar ein hadnodd naturiol mwyaf toreithiog - dwr. Dewi Prysor looks at how we use one of our most abundant natural resources - water.

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Dysga Alun sut mae'r sychder diweddara yn effeithio ar fferm yn y canolbarth, a Meinir sy'n clywed hanes beiciwr rhyngwladol. As the FUW celebrates its 70th, Nia visits its former president.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Rhifyn omnibws yn edrych nôl ar ddigwyddiadau yng Nghwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Hafiach

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon fe awn ni i'r haul i ddweud helo i'r llew ac i'r oerfel i gwrdd â'r pengwin. We take to the sun to say hello to the lion and to the cold to meet the penguin.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Tomi Broch wedi cael llond bol ar y tywydd oer ac mae'n mynd i gynhesu o flaen y tân yn nhy Benja. When Tomi Broch decides he's had enough of the cold he takes shelter by the fire.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y môr-ladron sy'n ymuno â Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae Pablo eisiau gwybod beth sy'n digwydd ym mhennod nesaf ei hoff sioe deledu, ac mae ef a'r anifeiliaid yn mynd ar daith am yr ateb. Pablo wants to know more about his fave TV programme.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Awn yn ol i'r flwyddyn 1804 i ddysgu am y trên stem cyntaf a gafodd ei ddefnyddio yng Nghymru, yn Merthyr Tudful. We return to 1804 to learn about the first ever steam train.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau yn teithio ar y Pip Cyflym... trên sy'n teithio ar draws Pentre Papur Pop! On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are aboard the Zip Express.

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Heddiw byddwn yn cwrdd ag archeolegydd sy'n cloddio mewn mynwent ger y Barri. An unusual hockey team in Cardiff is looking for new players of all ages, and we'll also hear your stories.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae'r traeth yn llawn o ryfeddodau lliwgar. Mae Fflwff a'i fryd ar gysgodwr gwynt, a'r Capten a Seren a'u llygaid ar gylch rwber a pharasol. The beach is full of lovely colourful things!

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Dringwyr ydy Stiw a Taid yn eu gêm, a mynydd i'w ddringo ydy grisiau'r ty. Stiw and Taid pretend to be mountaineers, and that the stairs are a mountain to climb.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae 'na sêr gwib di-rif yn gwibio heibio'r roced ac mae Jangl yn ceisio eu cyfri ond yn ei gweld yn amhosib. Jangl is trying to count shooting stars. There must be an easier way!

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Pan mae estron bach yn gadael anrheg i'r cwn mae'n rhaid i'r Pawenlu warchod creadur od o'r gofod. When a little stranger leaves the pups a present, they have to babysit a space creature.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw: ymweld â Bywyd Gwyllt Glaslyn, mynd am dro i Gastell Dryslwyn, a hwyl mewn Ysgol Goedwig ger Caerfyrddin. Join Meleri and Huw as they go on all sorts of open air adventures.

programme.title: Caru Canu

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau

programme.title: Guto Gwningen

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...

programme.title: Run for the Sun
programme.desc: 1956. Thriller. Directed by Roy Boulting. Stars Jane Greer, Richard Widmark & Trevor Howard. An author and a journalist find themselves at the mercy of wanted war criminals in the Mexican jungle. [S]

programme.title: King Kong 2
programme.desc: 1986. Action. Director: John Guillermin. Stars Brian Kerwin, Linda Hamilton & Peter Elliott. Years after his fall from a skyscraper, King Kong is in a coma and in dire need of a blood transfusion. [S]

programme.title: Allan Quatermain & The Lost City of Gold
programme.desc: 1986. Adventure. Director Gary Nelson. Stars Richard Chamberlain, Sharon Stone & James Earl Jones. Quatermain sets out to find his missing brother and the Lost City of Gold. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Saturday Special
programme.desc: 1969. An enchanting glimpse of the work of the Children's Film Foundation.

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Wheels/Grayling Fishing. 1981. Jack Hargreaves takes his strawberry cart to Mr. White the wheelwright for repairs. He then goes to the river Kennet for a spot of fishing for grayling. [S]

programme.title: Climb Up the Wall
programme.desc: 1960. Musical & Variety. Directed by Michael Winner. Featuring performers such as George 'Calypso' Browne, Russ Conway and Frances Day. [S]

programme.title: Fire Maidens From Outerspace
programme.desc: 1956. Sci-Fi comedy. Spacemen land on the 13th Moon of Jupiter and find man-hungry space girls waiting for them. Stars: Harry Fowler, Paul Carpenter & Sydney Tafler. [S]

programme.title: Jack the Giant Killer
programme.desc: 1962. Fantasy. Directed by Nathan Juran. Stars Kerwin Mathews, Judi Meredith, & Torin Thatcher. The treacherous Pendragon plots to gain the throne of Cornwall. Can anyone stop the evil sorcerer? [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed's Dilemma. 1963. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Irene Ryan & Bea Benaderet. Granny and Cousin Pearl fight over who's going to take care of the cooking and the house, leading Jed to step in. [S]

programme.title: Kansas Pacific
programme.desc: 1953. Western. Director: Ray Nazarro. Stars Sterling Hayden, Eve Miller, Barton MacLane. An army engineer is sent to oversee the construction of the Kansas Pacific railroad and stop any saboteurs. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life A Policeman's Lot
programme.desc: 1960. A look at a typical day in a policeman's life, which uncovers more than expected from the role.

programme.title: Worzel Gummidge
programme.desc: A Little Learning. 1979. Stars Jon Pertwee, Charlotte Coleman & Jeremy Austin. Worzel turns the farm upside down in a search for his misplaced turnip head which makes him very clever. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Deep Freeze. 1966. Stars Adam West, Otto Preminger & Kem Dibbs. As public animosity mounts, Batman and Robin hang up their capes. Meanwhile, Mr. Freeze decides to blackmail Gotham City. [S]

programme.title: The Golden Hawk
programme.desc: 1952. Adventure. Directed by Sidney Salkow. Stars Rhonda Fleming, Sterling Hayden & Helena Carter. 17th-century French privateer Kit 'The Hawk' Gerardo sails the Caribbean in search of gold. [S]

programme.title: 1950s Puzzle Corner
programme.desc: Charming question time set around a 1950s. Incredible shots of London Airport, Coventry, The Coast with puzzles to solve - How many grooves on a 12 inch LP? When will the B.O.A.C plane reach New York?

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: Hostage for a Hangman. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, John Arnatt, Jack Melford. Robin becomes troubled when he learns that the Sheriff plans to hang one serf a day until the outlaw gives himself up. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Sweetheart Story/Tyring a Cart. 1986. Jack shows a film of a house sale he attended in Berkshire and recounts the story of two lovers at opposite ends of the Edwardian social ladder. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: Fancy coming hop-picking with Mike and Noel? Or would you prefer a trip to 1940s Glasgow for a Cine Contest? Or a 1960s coffee drinking experience? And how about a reel featuring Bifball? [S]

programme.title: Went The Day Well?
programme.desc: 1942. War. Director: Cavalcanti. Stars: Leslie Banks, Mervyn Johns & Basil Sydney. English villagers stage a fight back when visited by a platoon of german troops. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Anything to Declare? 1960
programme.desc: A fascinating look at the Customs and Excise service in Britain.

programme.title: Gideon's Way
programme.desc: Boy with Gun. Stars John Gregson, Alexander Davion and Daphne Anderson. A boy shoots a punk that threatened him with a knife and runs away, joined by a young escapee. [S]

programme.title: The Wheeltappers and Shunters Social Club
programme.desc: Episode 28. 1975. In this jam packed episode, there are brilliant performances from The Chants, Joe 'Mr Piano' Henderson, George Roper, Lorne Lesley, Jim Bowen and The Hermits. [S]

programme.title: The Blue Lagoon
programme.desc: 1980. Drama. Directed by Randal Kleiser. Stars Christopher Atkins, Brooke Shields & Leo McKern. Two children are stranded on an enchanting island and experience the mysteries of adolescence. [S]

programme.title: Budgie
programme.desc: The Jump-up Boys. Stars Adam Faith, Iain Cuthbertson & Lynn Dalby. Budgie dons a white coat and takes a real job at last. But hearing that Budgie has gone straight, Charles suspects foul play. [S]

programme.title: Budgie
programme.desc: The Jump-up Boys. Stars Adam Faith, Iain Cuthbertson & Lynn Dalby. Budgie dons a white coat and takes a real job at last. But hearing that Budgie has gone straight, Charles suspects foul play. [S]

programme.title: The Heritage Chart Show with Mike Read
programme.desc: A TOTP style TV Show for Heritage Artists based on the Heritage Chart which is voted on in over 80 countries. Songs you love from popular artists, live and on video with the odd interview.

programme.title: The Strange World Of Planet X
programme.desc: 1958. Sci-fi. A British laboratory studying magnetic fields is warned by a cosmic visitor of the dangers in their experiments. Starring Forrest Tucker and Martin Benson. [S]

programme.title: A Little of What You Fancy
programme.desc: 1968. A loving tribute to British Music Hall with Lily Morris & Gus Elen. Featuring original archive film, rare prints, portraits and photographs, it traces what remains of the great music halls. [S]

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Badlands. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, Stephen McNally & Myron Healey. Bill Longley trails a ruthless bounty hunter who is in pursuit of a man falsely accused of bank robbery. [S]

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Celebration Blues. 1964. Stars Peggy Mount, David Kossoff & Barbara Mitchell. Alf arranges a secret booze-up to celebrate his birthday and Hetty uses an overheard conversation to get help. [S]

programme.title: Sky Liner
programme.desc: 1949. Thriller. Director: William Berke. Stars Richard Travis, Pamela Blake & Rochelle Hudson. An FBI Agent finds himself caught up in Cold War espionage when he boards a plane heading west. [S]

programme.title: Star Performance: Moorings
programme.desc: 1953. Drama. Directed by Roy Kellino. Stars Charles Boyer, Dorothy Malone & Will Wright. An overworked shipping magnate becomes entangled in the lives of a young boy and his blind mother.

programme.title: Echo Of Diana
programme.desc: 1963. Joan is distraught at the death of her husband in a plane crash but all is not what it seems. Stars: Vincent Ball & Betty McDowall. [S]

programme.title: Man From Tangier
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Director: Lance Comfort. Stars Robert Hutton, Lisa Gastoni & Martin Benson. Chuck Collins finds himself involved in a passport and forgery racket, just through taking the wrong coat! [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed throughout June. [S]

programme.title: Stock Car
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. After the death of her father while motor racing, the daughter (Rona Anderson) is dissuaded from selling his garage by fellow racer Larry (Paul Carpenter) who helps her run it. [S]

programme.title: Tiger By The Tail
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Director: John Gilling. John Desmond, (Larry Parks) meets a mysterious woman (Lisa Daniely) who turns out to be part of a counterfeit ring. Desmond is caught up in the whole affair. [S]

programme.title: Ride in the Whirlwind
programme.desc: 1966. Western. Directed by Monte Hellman. Stars Jack Nicholson, Cameron Mitchell & Millie Perkins. Three cowboys are pursued by a relentless posse after being mistaken for a gang of outlaws. [S]

programme.title: Two Wives at One Wedding
programme.desc: 1961. Crime. Directed by Montgomery Tully. Stars Gordon Jackson, Christina Gregg & Lisa Daniely. Tom's wedding day becomes a confusing nightmare when a stranger appears, claiming to be his wife. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies

programme.desc: Ariplane Museum Adventure: A welcome ceremony at the National Aviation Museum in Seoul is being held for Korea's oldest plane. But the old plane crashes on the way! (S5 Ep8)

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Swedish Snowstorm Sleepover: Jett and Jett Pet are called to Stockholm, Sweden, to deliver a smartphone so a girl named Lily can keep in touch with her friend, Karin, during a snowstorm. (S5 Ep9)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Spoiler Alert: Follow the adventures of kid car Cory Carson as he navigates the winding roads of childhood with his friends and family in Bumperton hills. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Cory Loses A Tooth: Follow the adventures of kid car Cory Carson as he navigates the winding roads of childhood with his friends and family in Bumperton hills. (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Trashy Romance: Follow the adventures of kid car Cory Carson as he navigates the winding roads of childhood with his friends and family in Bumperton hills. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Polar Bear: Nutty Hill is suffering from a heat wave. Searching for a bit of cool air, Grizzy has a brilliant idea. He'll get into the fridge, where the temperature will be more bearable. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Spread: Grizzy is frustrated: just as he was about to coat a nice big fresh salmon with chocolate spread and snuggle up in front of the TV, he discovers that the pantry is empty! (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Cellular Bear: Grizzy's nap is interrupted by the forest ranger's cell phone. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Jurassic Bear: Freed by the thawing ice, a giant egg slides up to the front door of the cabin. The lemmings watch the hatching of a baby dinosaur that soon thinks they are its parents. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Extreme Fitness: In order to woo the she-bear he's infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and get into shape with the ranger's bodybuilding equipment. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Domestic Robots: Grizzy discovers that the ranger's new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages, but the lemmings see the new gadget more as competition... (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel
programme.desc: Shell Game: Bubble sets out to create the ultimate scavenger hunt to tire out Delphina's hyper seahorse babies - but as she tries to come up with new clues, she becomes more exhausted. (S1 Ep45)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel
programme.desc: A Thorny Situation: When a guest loses her temper, Bubble must play mediator between her guest, Petal, and the thorns she scared away. (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: True And The Rainbow Kingdom
programme.desc: The Kittynati: True must stop a series of sudden water geysers from flooding the dojo where the Kittynati are training Bartleby to get his Red Tabby belt. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Esme and Roy
programme.desc: Throw And Tell: Esme and Roy arrive at the Ooga house, ready for a fun day with baby Fig. But things get tricky when Fig starts throwing everything in sight. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: Jeremy and Jazzy Compilations
programme.desc: Stop, Look and Listen/Happier/The Five R's/Come On Do The Boogie/Grow: Jeremy and Jazzy sing this song to remember how to safely cross a street. (S1 Ep108)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Catboy's Magic Trick: Determined to perform a magic trick, Connor finds an ancient teleporting sarcophagus. (S5 Ep17)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Gekko The Croc: Gekko is forced to be a sneaky crocodile instead of a loyal lizard because Pharaoh Boy has taken his friends prisoner. (S5 Ep18)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: The Camping Trip: Greg feels scared on an overnight camping trip. He thinks his night-time powers will help him but Orticia has something worrying in store. (S5 Ep19)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Pondweed Party: Orticia gets invited to Octobella's cave to help grow powerful pondweed. (S5 Ep20)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Party of One: Bill wants to have a small, quiet dinner party featuring his favorite fruit with his favorite three friends, but his besties don't listen to his wishes. (S2 Ep15)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Dinos to the Moon: It's a big day for Mazu - she's built a rocket to fly to the moon with her three best friends! (And Rugo, who stows away.) (S2 Ep16)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: Ricky the Chameleon: Boo has his dad's wildlife photography cloak. It lets you camouflage with any environment. Ricky has talked his friend into lending him the camouflage cloak for a day. (S2 Ep22)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: The Floor is Lava: Ricky and Tyra love playing with their dad. Resourceful Dad Saur has come up with a new game: "The Floor is Lava." The rules are very simple - you mustn't touch the floor. (S2 Ep23)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: The Genie in the Lamp: Ricky finds a lamp in a pile of trash. It looks just like a magic lamp! Though no genie actually comes out of it. But Ricky thinks up yet another way to prank Tyra. (S2 Ep24)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: Her Majesty The Spider: In the Middle-Ages, Molang and Piu Piu watch the king run after a small spider. He trips, falls into a magic caldron and turns into... a spider! (S5 Ep36)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Pirate's Tentacles: Molang and Piu Piu board a phantom ship where the captain is struck by a curse. To end the curse, Molang and Piu Piu have to teach the captain how to swim. (S5 Ep37)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Bewitched Lamp: In the desert, Molang and Piu Piu find a magic lamp. It may grant wishes, but it also causes some damage... (S5 Ep38)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Perfect Robot: Molang and Piu Piu order a robot that does everything, but don't realise it's doing too much... (S5 Ep39)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Umbrella: Molang and Piu Piu, engineers at the court of Louis XIV, invent an umbrella to protect the king and his wig. But the results are far from satisfying... (S5 Ep40)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Generous Genie: Mustard's skateboard was confiscated after he crossed the street without looking. Cars are so lame... If only one could fly over them! Ollie draws a magic lamp. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Mysterious Egyptian Pyramid: Mixo has decided to learn hieroglyphics, but if he really wants to do that, he needs to see the real thing, in Egypt. (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: Mustard's Messed-up Birthday: Today is Mustard's birthday, and the MiniWhats are trying to figure out what to get him. Ollie draws him a gigantic skateboard ramp. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: The Miniwhats

programme.title: The Miniwhats
